Address.Address1: 19 SUKHUMVIT SOI 18, SUKHUMVIT ROAD KLONGTOEY, BANGKOK,

Description.Text: Facilities include a large outdoor swimming pool with plenty of sunbathing chairs and a fitness room on the 4th floor. In addition, there is a large ballroom with a maximum capacity of 800 persons available for various functions, and other meetings services with two extra break-out rooms on the 3rd floor. The hotel offers a complimentary traditional tuk-tuk transfer service from the hotel to the main Sukhumvit Road for all guests. This hotel is suitable for all individual travelers seeking holiday pleasure in the heart of Bangkok, as well as all business travellers who seek convenient access to the major business districts in town. (10/06SW)

The hotel is centrally located on Sukhumvit Soi 18, within a 10 minute walk from the main Sukhumvit Road. There is easy access to both the sky train and subway at Asoke Station. The hotel is in the vicinity of famous shopping malls, such as the Robinson department store, as well as Emporium department store and several other local shops along the street. Additionally, Queen Sirikit National Convention Center is a 10 minute drive by car. Transfer from and to Suvarnabhumi International Airport is less than one hour.

The hotel offers variety of room categories: superior, deluxe, VIP room, and executive floor room, as well as selection of suites, such as terrace suites and executive suites. All rooms are the same size, 28 sq m, with the differences in layout, amenities and room privileges. Superior rooms starts are on the 5th through 12th floors, while deluxe rooms are located on the 14th through 21st floors. The executive lounge is located on 24th floor, with special privileges, such as personalized and express check-in and check-out, complimentary evening cocktails, unlimited high-speed Internet access, and others. All rooms provide elegant European ambience, with a green and beige color scheme. All offer either pool view or city view, and/or partial lake view. The bathrooms are large, equipped with standard toiletries and finished in grey marble.
It is a striking concrete high-rise building with 26 floors.

Breakfast is served at the caf√© located on the 2nd floor; lunch and dinner are also available on a la carte menu. Other famous delicacies are offered, such as fine dining Indian cuisine (claimed to be the best Indian restaurant in town), located on the rooftop 26th floor and offering a panoramic view of Bangkok. There is also a Mexican restaurant which is popular with locals, located on 4th floor. Traditional Italian cuisine is also available, as well as contemporary Thai cuisine. Most of restaurants also offer live music for dinner, such as Indian, Cuban and Thai instrumental groups.

The lobby offer elegant European boutique look. It is large and furnished in light brown granite, with the reception area on the left and an open lobby lounge on the right. A Filipino pianist plays on most nights.
